abstract: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.
snippet: A Web site offers some help with flexible spending account reimbursements for over-the-counter drugs.
lead_paragraph: New I.R.S. rules that went into effect this year, as part of the Affordable Care Act, made it harder for consumers to have non-prescription medicines reimbursed from health-care flexible spending accounts.

headline.main: Some Help Getting Reimbursed for OTC Drugs
